data.text: Ma lâiahan mi senkhatngei an oma, ha ngei han Galilee mingei Pathien kôma an inbôl lâia Pilat'n, mi a that thurchi Jisua an rila.
Jisua'n a thuona, “Ha anga, ithata an om hah Galilee rama midang ngei nêkin a nunsie uolin nin mindon mo?”
“Ni tet mak! Nangni ki ril, nangni khom nin sietna nin insîr nônchu, anni ngei angin nin thi var rang.
Mi sômleiriet ngei Siloam in insâng achima athi ngei hah Jerusalema midang ngei murdi nêkin an saloi uolin nin be mo?
Ni tet mak! Nangni ki ril nin sietna nin insîr nônchu anni ngei anghan thîng nin tih,” a tia.
Hanchu, Jisua'n hi chongmintêk hih a misîra, “Mi inkhatin a grape ruhuona theichang kung a linga. A mara a juong ena man maka.
Hanchu, ruhuon enkolpu kôma, ‘En roh, kumthum piel hih hi theichang kunga hin amara ku juong roka, inkhat luo man mu-ung.’ Phûrpai roh, ithomo mun ai luo tit ranga,” a tia.
Ania ruhuon enkolpu han, “O pu, kumkhat mamang la om hi rese, a revêl tuk ka ta, a urna rangin vur ki tih.
Nakuma ânrân chu sa ok a ta, ânra nôn chu phûrpai roh” tiin a thuona.
Sabathni voikhat chu Jisua'n, synagog ina a minchua.
Ramkhori sûr nupang inkhat kum sômleiriet damloi a oma, inkona injîk thei loi ani.
Hanchu, Jisua'n a mûn chu a koia, “Nuvengtenu na natna renga no jôk zoi” a tipea.
A chunga a kut a minngama, harenghan ân jîkzata, Pathien a minpâk zoi.
Hanchu, Jisua'n Sabathnîn mi a mindam sikin synagog taka ulienpu a ning a thika, mipui ngei kôma, “Sûnruk sin ei thona rang a om, ha nia han hong ungla dam roi, Sabathnîn chu ni no rese” a tia.
Pumapa'n a thuona, “Nangni, asarotholngei, nin serâtchal mo, nin sakuording mo, Sabathnin sûntin tui min nêk rangin nin tuong ngâi ni mak mo?
Hi nupang, Abraham jâisuon, kum sômleiriet, satanin ai khit hih, Sabathnin min jôk rang ni mak mo?” a tia.
A chongthuon han a râlngei mâimôk an tonga, mipui lakin a sininkhêl sin sikin an râisâna.
Jisua'n a rekela, “Pathien Rêngram hih imo ai ang? Ileh mo ki mintêk rang?
Ancham ru, mi inkhatin a lâka loilâia a tua. A kung ahonn insôna, thingkung ahong changa, a machangngeia han vangeiin rubu an phan anghan ani” a tia.
Jisua'n a rekel nôka, “Ileh mo Pathien Rêngram ki mintêk rang ani zoi?
Nupang inkhat chol a lâka, vâipôl, liter sômminli leh a minpola athoi mâka tâidôna ai bil angha ani” a tia.
Jisua'n Jerusalema a se malamin, khopuingei le khuotengeia mi a minchu ngeia.
Tumakhatin, O pu, mi tômte vai mo sanminjôka om rang? tiin a rekela.
Jisua'n a thuona, “Inkot in-epa lût rang ranak song roi, mi tamtakin bôk an ta chu lût thei no ni ngei.

A in pumapa ânthoia inkhâr akal suole chu, pêntieng indingin inkhâr tôk nin ta, ‘A pumapa, inkhâr mi mo-ong pe roh’ tîng nin ta, ama lakin, ‘Khotienga mi mo nin ni, nangni riet mu-ung, ko kôm renga rotpai roi,’ nangni tîng a tih.
Maleh, nangnin, munkhatin ei sâka, ei nêka, kin khopuia khom mi ni minchu ngâi duo! la tîng nin tih.”
Nikhomrese, ama han, “Khotienga mi mo nin ni, nangni riet ngâi mu-ung, Ko kôm renga rotpai roi, mipuoloi ngei nangni ti nôk a tih.”
“Ipaia nin om tikin chu chapin, hâ riel nin ta, Abraham ngei Isaac ngei, Jokob ngei le dêipungei murdi chu Pathien Rêngrama omin mûng nin tih.13:28: Mat 22:13; 25:3013:28,29: Mat 8:11,12
Mingei sak le thang, sim le mâr renga hongin Pathien Rêngram ruolhoia insung an tih.
Hanchu atûna nûktak ânta ngei khom hih motontak la nîng an ta, motontak ngei khom nûktak la nîng an tih,” 13:30: Mat 19:30; 20:16; Mk 10:31 a tia.
Ha lâitaka han, Pharisee senkhat an honga, Jisua kôma, “Jôk inla hi mun renga hih mun danga rot ta roh, Herod'n nang that rang ai ti kêng,” an tipea.
Jisua'n, “Se ungla ha sial hah varil roi, avien, nangtûk ramkhori rujûlpai ka ta, a sûnthum nîn ki sin zoi ki tih.”
Ikhomnisenla, avien, nangtûk, hatûk ke se tit rang ani, Jerusalem pêntieng dêipu that ngâi ni mak an tia.

“O, Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Dêipungei thatpu, no kôma Pathien'n a hongtîr ngei lung leh dêng thatpu, ârpuinûn a mantha nuoia ate ngei ai op ngâi anghan, voizet mo nang opbûm rang ko bôk zoi, ania nuom mak che.
13:35: Lap 118:26 Masikin, Pumapa riminga hong chu ‘Pathien'n satvur rese’ nin ti mâka chu nin Biekin ram a ta, ni mu nôk khâi no tunui,” a tia.
